ComicInfo.Summary: Honeymoon's Over!: Bruce and Betty leave for their honeymoon while Samson and the Hulkbusters tangle with the green goliath. As their cruise ship is leaving port, Bruce is informed that the Hulk is on another rampage and he passes out.
ComicInfo.Title: Honeymoon's Over!
